::Spears:

"Now your talking! Just who can we sent to attack while some stay 
behind to work on repairs?  Some of us are still in the CR's right 
now."  She had a worried look on her face.  "We are starting to 
dwildle in number." She looks down.  Sighing, "I just don't know how 
much more we can take." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker sighs, lowering his head. He clenches his fists. This was 
pissing him 
> off. Every couple of hours, there was an attack, and ussually a 
Maximal 
> casualty. He looks at Spears, glancing at the Ark for a second.
> 
> "We need to go on the offencive. If they keep attacking here, we 
soon 
> wouldn't stand a chance."
> 
> He looks at the Ark. "I think we should attack the Alliance or the 
Preds, 
> give them something to repair while we work on the Ark."
